original_title: SLT-MOBITEL dominates Business Today TOP 40 2022-2023 as only telco recognized in rankings
original_body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL, the National ICT Solutions Provider, has achieved another milestone by securing the prestigious honour of being ranked among Business Today’s TOP 40 2022-2023 listings, dominating the telecommunications industry in Sri Lanka.

In the rankings unveiled recently, SLT-MOBITEL is the only telecommunications provider among the Top 40 recognized for its dedication and innovation, a testament to the company’s resilience and excellence in navigating challenges.

Business Today’s annual TOP 40 rankings spotlight the most influential and impactful companies in Sri Lanka. SLT-MOBITEL has been included in the prestigious list for being a dynamic force in the telecommunications industry and playing a vital role in shaping the nation’s digital environment.

The listing specifically applauds SLT-MOBITEL’s efforts in providing widespread connectivity and bridging the digital divide, driving Sri Lanka towards a more connected and technologically advanced future through innovative initiatives that enable progress.
Additionally, the Business Today TOP 40 rankings consider various factors, including financial performance, strategic initiatives, and the impact on industry trends.

The rankings also highlighted the company’s key achievements that contributed towards its continuous growth, including the expansion of its fibre network to over 65,000 km, strengthening infrastructure to enable a smart digital economy, boosting R&D capabilities via its Embryo facility, and forming partnerships to introduce innovative services using technologies such as AI/ML, the metaverse and more.
